creator: naomiu@enigma.com
text:
Is the access into the database has timing ?
After few minute running the servlet (running in my application), it does not working and I need to 
reopen the application.

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
There isn't enough information here to identify the problem.  Also, if you are
actually using Tomcat 3.1, you might try Tomcat 3.2.2 or Tomcat 3.3 since
Tomcat 3.1 is not well supported at this point.  If there is still a problem in
Tomcat 3.2.2 or Tomcat 3.3, submit a new bug.  Please include a test case, or
at least enough information to understand what is happening.
